lines.text: You know what I think? I think the Go Wizard here is just like the Stop Wizard.
He ain't breathin', there's a hole in his chest, and there's blood everywhere.
You really want to try and explain all that without sayin' he's dead?
I think I do want to do that, Leo.
Like, let's start with the hole.
It's unnaturally round and tidy, right? Not typical for a bullet hole.
Sure, but the bleedin' and the no breathin' are real typical.
Yeah, yeah, I'll get to that.
But... you know, <c=#FF6000>Portable Hole</c> makes temporary, nondestructive holes in stuff.
The spell lists a maximum radius... but it doesn't say anything about a <c=#FF00FF>minimum radius!</c>
If he cast it on <c=#FF00FF>himself,</c> he could create the appearance of a bullet hole, without actually getting hurt!
Well, that's great, but ''without actually gettin' hurt'' clearly ain't what happened here.
Unless you want to explain how he faked the bleedin' and lack of pulse, too.
Uh... hm. I don't think that's too hard to figure out, actually...
Yeah? I'll believe it when I see it.
